text: Tomadera jan'ya yud'dha bidhibad'dha kara halo, athaca tomadera jan'ya ta apritikara. Ara hate pare tomara kono-kichu apachanda karale, athaca ta tomadera jan'ya mangalajanaka, abara hate pare tomara kono-kichu bhalobasale, athaca ta tomadera jan'ya manda. Ara allaha janena, yadi'o tomara jano na.
